name: Smartphone X
long_description: Experience the latest in mobile technology with Smartphone X. Featuring a powerful processor, stunning display, and advanced camera capabilities.

name: Laptop Pro
long_description: Laptop Pro is designed for professionals on the go. With its sleek design, high-resolution display, and fast processor, it's the perfect companion for your work or entertainment.

name: Fitness Tracker 2000
long_description: Stay on top of your fitness goals with the Fitness Tracker 2000. Monitor your steps, heart rate, and sleep patterns with this sleek and comfortable wearable device.

name: Wireless Earbuds
long_description: Enjoy a wire-free listening experience with our Wireless Earbuds. With high-quality sound and a comfortable fit, these earbuds are perfect for music lovers on the move.

name: Coffee Maker Deluxe
long_description: Start your day right with the Coffee Maker Deluxe. This premium coffee maker ensures a delicious and aromatic cup of coffee every time, with customizable brewing options.

name: Gaming Console Ultra
long_description: Immerse yourself in the world of gaming with the Gaming Console Ultra. Featuring powerful graphics and a vast game library, it's the ultimate console for gamers.

name: Smartwatch Infinity
long_description: The Smartwatch Infinity is more than just a timepiece. Receive notifications, track your fitness, and stay connected on the go with this stylish and functional smartwatch.

name: HD Smart TV
long_description: Transform your living room with the HD Smart TV. Enjoy stunning visuals, smart features, and a world of entertainment options right at your fingertips.

name: Digital Camera Pro
short_description: Capture the moment in high definition
long_description: Unleash your photography skills with the Digital Camera Pro. With advanced features and high-resolution capabilities, it's the perfect tool for capturing life's special moments.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
long_description: Say goodbye to tangled cables with the Wireless Charging Pad. Simply place your device on the pad to charge it effortlessly, providing a clutter-free charging experience.

name: Home Security System
short_description: Protect your home with advanced security
long_description: Keep your home safe and secure with the Home Security System. Monitor your property, receive alerts, and have peace of mind with this advanced security solution.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
long_description: Take your music anywhere with the Bluetooth Speaker. With powerful sound and a compact design, this portable speaker is perfect for outdoor adventures and indoor gatherings.

name: Electric Toothbrush
long_description: Upgrade your oral care routine with the Electric Toothbrush. Featuring advanced cleaning technology, it ensures a thorough and effective clean for a brighter smile.

name: Smart Home Thermostat
long_description: Optimize your home's energy efficiency with the Smart Home Thermostat. Easily control and monitor your home's temperature from anywhere, saving you money and reducing energy waste.

name: Wireless Mouse
long_description: Enhance your computing experience with the Wireless Mouse. Enjoy precise control and the freedom of wireless connectivity, making it an essential accessory for your desktop or laptop.
